website_summaries.verdict: One of the first laptops that can drive games at 4K resolutions, the Asus G751 is an expensive but capable alternative to gaming desktops.
pros: The Asus G751 has excellent performance, can drive games at 4K resolution, and includes a few handy shortcut keys gamers will appreciate
cons: You could buy about a dozen game consoles for what this costs
Battery life and design are stuck in the past
You'll need an external 4K TV or monitor for the highest-res gaming

customer_reviews.title: The heat distribution is amazing it runs hots but you can be sure it ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid build, solid customer support. This was a laptop made for the gamer who cant have a desktop. I am running most all top tier games on ultra. THe entire build of this product was exactly what i was expecting. The laptop i feel could be dropped 3 feet and be ok "Please dont test that" its a solid ASUS product and i would expect nothing less then that from them. Republic of gamers tag team is always a plus. The heat distribution is amazing it runs hots but you can be sure it will never overheat with the fan system. I have owned it for 8 months now and not a single issue.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: If you can handle Win 10 this machine is as good as it gets at this price point!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is lightning fast for any online activities. I upgraded this machine to 32GB Ram to future proof it somewhat. Only 1 major complaint not the fault of the vendor. This ASUS ROG laptop and most other in the ASUS Gaming Line will NO LONGER support downgrading to WIN 7 PRO which is not mentioned in the description. And Microsoft has dramatically raised the price on Win 7 Pro. Why? BIOS will support Win 8 or Win 10 only!
customer_reviews.author: D R Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Powerhouse Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great Laptop. This thing is almost is powerful as my HP z800 workstation. I used this for video editing and color correction in Davinci Resolve. It's handled anything I through at it. The 980M has been excellent for video acceleration. I have done any gaming on it so I can not comment on that. The DVD/Bluray drive is too sensitive with the button. a light touch will open it. It gets opened almost every-time I sit the computer down. I'd like ASUS to make a firmware update for the drive and then a companion software to run on the computer that could disable the hardware button and just eject on the computer. I don't see that happening though.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F

customer_reviews.title: Great but a hardware issues.
customer_reviews.text: Within a week the CD drive door broke. its pretty crappy when you spend this much on a really good laptop only to have to hold the cd drive door close with electric tape. I was really upset about it, still am. For some reason the power cord that connects to the laptop itself always seem to pop off. If it get caught on the slightest thing it will come out. now that really pisses me off. Aside from those two thing, which may seem small, the laptop is amazing. I love it. I was just to lazy to turn it in and have it repaired. I think any gamer will really enjoy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck this is the best gaming laptop for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily for HD video editing, but I am amazed at this laptop's ability to play CPU/Video demanding games. I installed AMRA 3, BeamNG and this machine had no issues playing them at high settings. No stutter and smooth gameplay. The sound quality is excellent, good keyboard too. Battery life can be short if you are pushing the machine, but you can get solid runs if you are just browsing the web or other non-demanding tasks. So far no complaints- the build quality is excellent and it's a solid workhorse!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Allen

customer_reviews.title: Biggest disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an ASUS laptop a few months ago and it was working perfectly. So when I purchased this laptop, I presumed that this would function just as well. However, I ran into problems immediately after I opened the laptop. 1. The base of the laptop wasn't even completely screwed in. 2. The laptop grey screened immediately on me when I powered it on Amazon customer service was on point. They got me a full refund on my purchase. 5 stars to the customer service, 0 stars to ASUS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: GREAT LAPTOP. I purchased this mainly for gaming and I know many people would consider purchasing a laptop for gaming not even in the picture because it's extremely hard to upgrade, but I wanted this for college because who wants a massive desktop in their dorm. I absolutely love this computer though I've had it for about 2 months now and zero complaints. The performance is always 100% and when it does act up it's always because of windows 10's stupid auto update "feature". I recommend this laptop to anyone who has the budget, but don't buy this if it's just gonna sit on your desk and look pretty. This beast performs and you should enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: This bad boy lasted just over 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Never, ever, EVER buy a laptop from Asus. This bad boy lasted just over 1 year. Battery is 100% gone, and now Bootloader issues. ZERO customer support outside 1 year (unless your willing to shell out around $400 for a new battery.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: its a gamers rig that can handle whatever i throw at it
customer_reviews.text: It's able to handle whatever I throw at it. got it for video editing and the occasional game. It's absolutely a gamers rig, right down to the numbers lock key being a hotkey for the ROG control center. this was mildly annoying but once I got used to it, its not a problem. I don't have much use for the ROG control panel, but its a gamers rig and if I get more time to goof off, i'm sure i'd learn to love the ability to control my gaming experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Colvard

customer_reviews.title: The ram was missing...
customer_reviews.text: It was DOA, willing to try a 2nd one after returning the 1st and chalk it up to shipping and handling, but here's the kicker: the ram was missing. I then used my own ram that was compatible and it only booted up to a back lit screen with gray lines running up and down. Saw no post or anything other than the lines. Will update if I receive a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jaeger

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop two weeks ago and even though I'm still learning all the features of Windows 10, I can say without any reservations that this laptop kicks ass. I always wanted a laptop without any speed or function limitations. To be more specific I was looking for a laptop that I could use for work related functions and also for games. This laptop plays all my games at high resolution and great frame rates. It feels like a desktop. I highly recommend this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rios

customer_reviews.title: The video performance is amazing and laptop feels like it's very well built with ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop as an upgrade from my Asus G75vw which has a 670mx video card. The video performance is amazing and laptop feels like it's very well built with a quality keyboard and red back lit keys. 24 gig of DDR3L memory, Blu ray burner, quality screen, quality keyboard, 980m video card ... what's not to love! The only thing I wasn't expecting was the built in battery...not sure why they decided to make it a fixed component.
customer_reviews.author: fidelity21

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: I've been putting this laptop through it's paces for over a month now, and I'm still impressed with its performance. It runs everything I've thrown at it at nearly max settings. The Witcher 3, GTA V, MGS: TPP, Overwatch and everything else in my library run beautifully. The build quality of the laptop is top notch, and the cooling system is the best I've ever seen in a laptop. So why only 4 stars? The first laptop I received had a defective screen. Amazon was quick to send a replacement out, and thankfully this one worked perfectly. For the price, you can't beat this setup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding machine, but no bluray software?
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic product. I have ran data mining software and various games on it and am very impressed. The price was right as well for a high end machine. It doesn't feel cheap at all and the SSD and platter drive are a nice bonus. Con- only one gripe here- asus did not bundle DVD/Blu-ray software that I can see. Sadly this will cost me at least $60 to get the Blu-ray player working. For a $2300 machine this is silly. I have gotten $60 games free for buying video cards, I do hope manufacturers catch on and start bundling DVD/bluray software. I do wish I could give it 4.5 stars but alas the option doesn't exist.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Solid gaming laptop, absolutely recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I've had an Alienware and a Eurocomm gaming laptop and this beats both hands down. Price was great, performance is top notch -- I can run Dota2 with max effects, and run Outlook, Excel, One Note, and a host of other crap. Keyboard has a great feel but I mostly use the Razer Nostromo keypad for gaming. Good screen and the weight is manageable, I haul it around a lot. My only wish is that the USB ports were in the back, not on the side.
customer_reviews.author: mizh

customer_reviews.title: Perfection is expensive but SO worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I must say that after a couple of months contemplating what gaming laptop to get, this has to be THE best choice I've ever made. Pricey? Yeah, but I got everything I paid for and more. The 3-4 second boot up is awesome. The games on Steam I play are gorgeous. The 1080p blu rays I watch are awesome. Everything is AWESOME 😊 Best purchase I have made in a LONG time. You want some quality? Buy this damn laptop 😠
customer_reviews.author: JudgeMethos

customer_reviews.title: I Like!! - Run any game in the maximum ...
customer_reviews.text: I Like!! - Run any game in the maximum configuration - The keyboard is excellent - The screen is very good with great contrast and response time - The cooling system is the best in class! Not Like =( - The keyboard could have choice of colors the color red bother some - The construction is good but could be better - The price is high - The old version come with gifts, a backpack and a mouse that I have not been anything but a huge empty box
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Henrique

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except for 1 complaint...
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the audio ports are on the right side and towards the front, this blocks your mouse, to an extent, if you have an external mouse for games or whatever. Customer service can be a bit short as well but other than that PERFECT! Still using this in 2020!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Solid Gaming Laptop
customer_reviews.text: It plays stream and origin games very well. Mass Effect Andromeda, Skyrim, Borderlands, etc. Good design vents heat away from player.and it starts up quickly. It is great for editing audio and video as well. This is my second ASUS ROG machine and I am very happy with it. (I wore the old one out!)
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Williams

customer_reviews.title: well good & like it
customer_reviews.text: Hi every body that computer is very strong I'm able play my favorites games wish is in very high or ultra settings there are some of things not in order on the keyboard like the functional key must have two sides also since this computer suitable for multimedia it must have buttons for the sound not like the ordinary notebook for business , also the sound is loud and good only its coming from the left side of the computer . this system is way better in design & very quiet . my last word I like it & happy :) wish you good luck every body bye
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Eng

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gaming machine
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop.. I play a lot of games and it handles everything I have thrown at it at ultra / max settings. I got it for world of war rafts new expansion, which it runs on ultra setting in a looking for raid group at 50 fps, and in ogre at 90+ fps. It runs battlefield 4 max well, not sure of fps on that one though.
customer_reviews.author: Coolaid

customer_reviews.title: ASUS refuses service warranty on 1 month old laptop!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in December and the DVD drive opens constantly by itself AND will not burn a DVD. ASUS will not ship parts and insists that we ship it to California and said it could take up to 3 weeks to get it back to us. We run a business and cannot afford to be without that laptop for that long. Shoddy defective product and ZERO customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Rogo

customer_reviews.title: Super fast, I use it for video and photo ...
customer_reviews.text: Super fast, I use it for video and photo processing and is lighting fast, the down side is the weight
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's not bad, however whoever upgraded the laptop from Windows 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's not bad, however whoever upgraded the laptop from Windows 7 to Windows 10 didn't do a very good job of it and the system is basically confused whether it's a 64 bit or 32 bit system, making downloads of any kind a nightmare. I really do wish they would've just kept the system at Windows 7 instead of messing with it like this.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Tseng

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Wish it had more USB slots and more ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Wish it had more USB slots and more space for RAM, but does the job. Works better than previous Asus and some other brands I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed and Satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the first review I've done for a product I've purchased through Amazon. I'll keep it concise. Pros: Extremely quiet, best laptop keyboard to-date, screen is amazing, no heat coming from anywhere but the back fans, can play every game on max settings to include Tomb Raider, Skyrim + Workshop mods, Sleeping Dogs Definitive Edition. Cons: Extremely low battery life when playing games on Ultra--but what can you expect? Not really a con. Why are the power port, Ethernet, and audio jacks on the right side? It doesn't actually interfere with mouse, but comes close.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Fast. Excellent features. Even has a "Steam" button
customer_reviews.text: A very fast laptop. Handles anything you throw at it. Runs games at max settings where my old laptop just chugged through on low settings. I was apprehensive about Windows 8.1 but nothing to fear. Setup was quick and simple. Excellent features. Even has a "Steam" button. ASUS put a lot of thought into this and it shows.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Good Hardware, Bad Drivers
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is good but the drivers are junk. It took ASUS 7 months to produce a working sound driver for Windows 8. Under the Windows 10 tech preview the sound drivers do not work properly and the buttons for the touch pad do not work. The touch pad itself works well so the buttons are not needed to get things done. Also I use a mouse most of the time for gaming. It plays the latest games and runs quiet which is what I was looking for. ASUS says it will release new drivers for Windows 10 once it goes on sale. Lets hope it does not take another 7 months for that to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Eager

customer_reviews.title: Great labtop though very heavy (it is a sacrifice you ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in one piece, Great labtop though very heavy (it is a sacrifice you have to make for portability and performance). Heard alot of people complaining about the screen problem, but mine turns out fine. Though, left bottom side of the screen frame is kinda loose, I can feel it when pressing it. Dont know the problem but will take it to the factory once I move back to Taiwan.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop, super fast
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, super fast, high quality graphics, really really quiet, web cam is horrible it's better to have an external one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The laptop came with a issue on the screen! I can't even use! I want my many back or a new one! I bougth this laptop for my job and i can't use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another Happy ASUS Customer
customer_reviews.text: I received my G751 in early March 2015. What an outstanding laptop. Everything about this system is quality. I can not say enough about the speed of boot up, graphics quality, and overall performance. It definitely exceeds my expectations. I have owned HP, Toshibas, and ACER laptops but this laptop beats all of them hands down. The only item I am considering is to add another 8GB of RAM to maximize memory.
customer_reviews.author: Go4er

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfection
customer_reviews.text: For the money, one of the best gaming laptops around. On the heavy side but with the power it packs that's to be expected. High frame rates with everything I've thrown at it! Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: RobMars

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is useless
customer_reviews.text: Asus refuses to let any local technician fix my computer under warranty because it is this model specifically. I cannot afford to send it out of state for three weeks while working and going to college. I will never buy from Asus again.
customer_reviews.author: Salem Nightlark

customer_reviews.title: The computer it self is great!!
customer_reviews.text: The computer it self is great!!! But... the way the computer manufactures are installing the software and drivers on computers today really sucks!! I am sure it is Microsoft who does not want anyone to have a disk. They should put copy right block so you can't copy the disk. I hope the second one does not have corrupted software.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Miller

customer_reviews.title: Performance of the 980M is excellent for a mobile GPU
customer_reviews.text: Solid machine. Performance of the 980M is excellent for a mobile GPU. It can handle most modern games without a hitch. The laptop itself handles heat well and quietly. The SSD lets it boot up fast. Any downsides are minor annoyances. Moving the laptop while running seems to invariably cause the DVD drive to open. The power connector is a tad loose and can fall out more easily than it should. It could have benefited from a touch screen since Windows 8.1 is difficult to use without one. None of these things are so terrible when you consider that in the areas where it counts, its performance more than makes up for any shortcomings.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery location and service
customer_reviews.text: Battery has lost its ability to charge very quickly and the only way to replace it is a $900 service by the company
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Clean Windows, very powerful, great Desktop replacement
customer_reviews.text: Well made, very fast, awesome GPU, relatively clean windows installed (not to much 3rd party software) All in all very very nice Laptop, using it for video rendering and Games like Battlefield 4 etc. great Desktop replacement What can I say, you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Johannes

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Might be a monster to try and carry around, but you get used to it's heavy design. This would be about the only disadvantage. Everything else is absolutely perfect, and can keep on giving you that same perfect quality for hours on end, thanks to the rear venting. Stellar job, Asus!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary F.

customer_reviews.title: Keep up the good work ASUS
customer_reviews.text: Great computer, it came ready to go right out of the box. I have had no problems with it at all. I use it as my desktop and gaming computer. It works wonder in both modes
customer_reviews.author: TGA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop! High performance, can open almost all my games with the highest set and very silent when I play games such as skyrim.
customer_reviews.author: Silu

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended over Alienware
customer_reviews.text: Despite having a somewhat awkward keyboard, the G751JY has exceeded my expectations: Lightning FAST! (I've ordered a matching 8GB of RAM to max it out at 32GB [Samsung P/N: M471B1G73DB0-YK0]). Highly recommended over Alienware.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an Alienware and it came defective, they wouldn't send me out a new one until they tried to repair it. I wasn't interested and I bought this laptop after I shipped the Alienware back. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rippedgeek

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: The first computer I bought was defective; however, the return was simple and had a new one in a couple days. The computer is ok for gaming, but personally not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stovall

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for 3 years and can still play most of the new games!
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for 3 years and can still play most of the new games!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming laptop I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It is awesome! Windows 8 isn't my favorite, but this laptop is incredibly fast as a gaming laptop, and I have no issues at all with it.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Lu

customer_reviews.title: Laptop feel, size, display and hardware are top ...
customer_reviews.text: Laptop feel, size, display and hardware are top notch. Not a fan of the bloat wear but some tools are neat to play around with sense this laptop is mainly for gamers.
customer_reviews.author: FinalFlash

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Only thing is a little short on battery life. Graphics and speed are phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: The machine looks gorgeous, runs like a lightning bolt, and has a large, beautiful screen. Only a couple of things I don't care for: the inside tends to develop marks too easily for my tastes. (Fingerprints, smudges, etc.) The fact that the battery is NOT removable is also concerning. If the battery dies, I may just have to replace the whole unit. And at over $2000, that would be quite pricey. Small complaints though, and I love the laptop overall.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Mother heffing amazing I tell you what
customer_reviews.text: Mother heffing amazing I tell you what, its like a brand new hi-def plasma screen with everything of a highclass computer in between. not to mention its freaking gorgeous on the outside as well. but its heavier than hell though, I have a hard time lifting it with just one hand, but that's easily fixable for I have been a lazy ass for a bit haha
customer_reviews.author: Derek Padilla

customer_reviews.title: I just hate the speakers
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to review but so far no problems....I just hate the speakers. Hence why I bought me some headphones and bose BT speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Panda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing computer, extremely powerful, seems worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good laptop, high performance and excellent graphics. I haven't really put it to the test yet but it seems worth the price. It's better than my desktop computer (though it's two years old), so I'm really happy with it. 2 minor flaws to mention, the power socket isn't very snug, easy for it to pop out accidentally, and the disk drive eject button is very sensitive and will pop open at the slightest of bumps. These aren't real problems they just seem like they might get annoying after a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming laptop. There is nothing else to say about it! I've had it for over 3 months and I've never had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Javier de la Garza

customer_reviews.title: The Best of The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because I did not think an extra ten gigs of ram would matter. For the most part it does not. But I recommend that if you care at all about graphics, then get the most recent and best options for this lap top. I have never had ANY issues with heat, although you can feel how hot it gets if you set it on your lap. BEAUTIFUL Display - I Mean GORGEOUS !!! I use it for anything I can think of. and the amount of space that is provided is amazing. takes a bit to get used to the keyboard though.
customer_reviews.author: Justin T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent computer far better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent computer far better than I expected. Great screen and the computer is very fast. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Speaker problem
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that bothers me is that it came with a distortion sound in the left speaker. I sent it back to get it fixed and they did, but it was only a temporary fix; two or three weeks later the distortion sound was back. I had to buy a separate speaker (Bose Mini II SoundLink - recommended!!) in order to get a clear sound.
customer_reviews.author: Javier V.

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop.. but I got a lemon keyboard back lighting would blink a couple of times the go out . .tried update on drivers no luck.. but it had smoken graphics awsome game play. .also no media player for blue-ray player.. so guess you have to purchase separately didn't get that far with it .. returned for a refund cause of keyboard lighting.. Wil try my luck with another G751
customer_reviews.author: kevin cardwell

customer_reviews.title: Meeting and exceeding expectations
customer_reviews.text: Apart from a slightly unexpected disk configuration this computer was everything that I wanted (and a bit more) in a gaming computer. Fast, silent and a great screen. OK, it is heavy if you want to carry it around, but I was expecting that :)
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: McAfee is annoying but otherwise runs smoth
customer_reviews.text: Arrived Early, was extra excited when it did. So far no problems, McAfee is annoying but otherwise runs smoth. Boot up takes only a minute or two and set up was done in 5. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sissye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and runs games quickly... pelnty of speed to run graphic design and animation programs as well.
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: a great investment.
customer_reviews.text: I aqm enjoying this computer. It did have a substantial amount of updating to accomplish when first powered on. Otherwise, a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D Reed

customer_reviews.title: Very fast.. still waiting to see if the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very fast.. still waiting to see if the fans hold up. My last ASUS had the video card fail.
customer_reviews.author: waddog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great laptop for gamers. Not for normal ultrabook users or people not willing to carry this laptop around.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo C.

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with my new ASUS Rog!!!
customer_reviews.text: Flawless machine. I love it and I hope it serves me long into my gaming future!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zeddicus 2018

customer_reviews.title: My kid love it and I must say
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brillant. My kid love it and I must say, not being a big Windows fan, this one works pretty well. For gamers this is a great system. And I didn't find any bloatware installed on it. It even had a fully working version of McAfee pre-installed.
customer_reviews.author: MR EH

customer_reviews.title: Best investment i have ever made
customer_reviews.text: Best investment that I could have made this machine runs almost as fast as my gaming tower which is just over a year old....I made this investment so I could have my games with me during hospital stays from surgeries and when traveling out of state
customer_reviews.author: Charles W Buck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased so far with this unit no problems at all
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Sent back for refund.
customer_reviews.text: When we bought the computer, it failed to find the wifi adapter. I called tech support and we got it fixed...for a while. The adapter disappeared again. Three calls to tech support with no fix. I took it to my office IT department as well. Returned it for a refund. It looked awesome but I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carl in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Well played, ASUS. Well played.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful computer which epitomizes "the perfect computer." I have absolutely zero complaints, which frankly, makes me a bit nervous. I have never owned anything where I haven't found some significant room for improvement. Until now. The SSDs in this thing are insane--I can boot up in less than 10 seconds. The 980GTX is incredible and chews up everything I throw at it. It's responsive, comfortable, cool, and quiet. It came with very little bloatware. Overall, you bet that I recommend this product. And all ASUS products in general. This is more than a computer--it is a solid gem, and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Laptop is amazing its fast and handle AAA games like a pro
customer_reviews.text: Laptop is amazing its fast and handle AAA games like a pro, one downsize is the speakers, the are horrible and unusable you need a headset or another method apart from using the laptop speakers! If you can live with that then buy it
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: This laptop takes everything i throw at it like its nothing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is an absolute monster. I got it to play games and play them to their maximum graphic potential. This laptop takes everything i throw at it like its nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kale Keigley

customer_reviews.title: Great, but many of the drivers were no only ...
customer_reviews.text: Great, but many of the drivers were no only out of date but incorrectly installed or not installed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Forget using DVD
customer_reviews.text: Game quality excellent. DVD driver does not work. Similar complaint by others.
customer_reviews.author: GrayDog

customer_reviews.title: Real Desktop replacement
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic lappy. Speed, visuals and performance. I barely hear the fans ever and when gaming it goes up only a touch. I use both Mac and PC and this laptop is the first the really works and plays like a desktop.
customer_reviews.author: CY

customer_reviews.title: Monster Machine
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding performance for a laptop. This is the second ASUS product I've purchased and this one blows the doors off the previous ASUS gaming machine. This one came with a 1TB HDD but being used to the performance of an SDD I installed one as the boot drive and moved the original one as a secondary. Now the beast is a monster performer. I contacted the customer support staff at EXCaliberPC a couple of times with questions and they were very responsive and provided excellent customer support. Strongly recommend you consider this laptop for your gaming needs. You'll not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepless in MD

customer_reviews.title: ASUS makes great, upgradable gaming notebooks!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded the memory from 24GB to 32GB, upgraded the 256GB OEM Samsung XP941 PCIe 2.0 M.2 AHCI SSD to the larger, faster 512GB OEM Samsung SM951 PCIe 3.0 M.2 AHCI SSD, & upgraded the 1TB SATA 3 7200 rpm Hitachi storage HDD (now an external 1TB storage HDD ) to a 1TB Samsung 850 Pro SATA 3 SSD. This notebook with the upgrades plus its' stock Nvidia GTX 980M GPU & Intel core i7 CPU is now an awesome 17" gaming notebook!
customer_reviews.author: Jon G.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for gaming .. watch the hard drives
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using it for about 7 months for LOL, WOW and a variety of other games and downloads ... great computer for gaming -- one warning when you first get it is that when you download your games there are 2 hard drives! Make sure you aren't downloading the games to the drive with the operating system on it (WHICH IS THE DEFAULT BY THE WAY) ... otherwise it will say out of memory space
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Leavitt

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. I feel like I have been blessed with miricale of life. Yes, this laptop is my baby. The keyboard feels awesome, it's not a mechanical keyboard; but a close runner-up. The screen is also very clear. ASUS did very well. Has plenty of ports and is easily my best purchase in 2016. Very classy, very well made. It's not an in-your-face gaming laptop. Heat distribution is very good, I have a glass desk so this was a concern of mine. The track pad is large and the steam button is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime G.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Graphics are astounding. Did not realize it is a single core machine! Takes a little longer than I would like to open some apps. But playing a single game, it is unmatched. I play WOW and any Steam Game in Highest video setting just fine. Great machine. A little heavy. Had a hard time finding a bag to carry it because it is so large. Be sure to get the 7-18+ inch laptop bags, not the "Fits most 17 inch laptops" bags.
customer_reviews.author: SFSwampfox

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, I love it
customer_reviews.text: Had since Nov. 26th. No probs, everything is lightning quick and games play on ultra high. Can't wait till I mod out skyrim
customer_reviews.author: jason stoner

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Computer
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problems with it so far. It is fast, reliable, and has a crystal clear screen. The USB ports are hard to push devices into, but I only assume that's child-proofing. I've gotten used to it pretty quickly and can push stuff in with little effort. They keyboard is very reliable (however my typing skills are not), and it rarely ever messes up like my old ASUS. The buttons at the top of the keyboard (Record, Steam, Macros 1-3) are a blessing to have in some games. I don't do much PC gaming (since I don't really have any friends on PC), but it can be used for other things as well. All in all, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie W.

customer_reviews.title: incredible
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Make sure if you're new to Asus that you hold down the "fn" key (function) while you press the "f1,f2" and so on keys or it will not work. My games are incredibly fast.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Craig Tomczak

customer_reviews.title: i really like the laptop very high performance and good price but ...
customer_reviews.text: i really like the laptop very high performance and good price but the battery goes very fast within 2hr or less will be 0. very fast boot 4 Sec.
customer_reviews.author: Aqeel A.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Blazing fast. Super clear screen. Really appreciate that it vents in the back instead of the bottom -- you can actually hold it on your lap without covering the vents! Couldn't be happier with it :)
customer_reviews.author: Dneb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great computer so far.playing steam is great and I also go dragon age which runs great
customer_reviews.author: diswald

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful laptop, however: 3 of the 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful laptop, however: 3 of the 4 USB ports stopped working within a week, and the laptop started requiring me to keep the AC power unplugged when booting or restarting as it would just loop restart not get past POST with AC power.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Do not Bother
customer_reviews.text: This product did not last even a year. It was too expensive to fix, so I am just planning to make sure my next computer is a better brand name. The closest Asus repair facility to me is in NYC. That is two hours away. And I have heard the lines are unbelievable. Plus, they will not accept a returned computer via UPS or FedEx.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 21 year old son to replace ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 21 year old son to replace 5 year old Lenova. It's a little heavy with the blu-ray but he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: No further problems
customer_reviews.text: No dead pixels, or faulty speakers or any of those issues some buyers have been reporting... (Y)
customer_reviews.author: Cendy Castro

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: I waited about a month and a half after I recieved this laptop. Let me tell you there have been no problems with it so far. The thing is a beast and my god I love it. Asus impressed me. I would have loved some super cool audio card but hey you win some and loose some. The disk drive is in a s***ty spot aswell. Who used disks anyone anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Haggerty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only cons is sometime you hit cd room by accident when moving around the laptop
customer_reviews.author: Khaled Alshalal

customer_reviews.title: project cars in ultra and goes awesome. the keyboard is very nice i like it ...
customer_reviews.text: i cant belive how fast is this laptop. I Tried bf4 , project cars in ultra and goes awesome. the keyboard is very nice i like it so much i feel the keys perfectly. i recomend this laptop for gaming , and for carry... its not a slim one, but it can be carry as normal please...
customer_reviews.author: Florencia M.

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy another
customer_reviews.text: Less than 30 days after the warranty expires, the battery begins to die. Normally a moderate disappointment but in this laptop, the battery is only reachable after you disassemble the whole laptop!!! Nice machine except for this, an unforgivable shortcoming.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Mysterioso

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy Very Pleased !!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lab top the graphics are awesome played BF4 on Ultra average 75 fps in campaign mode played World Of Warships on max settings and HDMI to 65 inch 4K UHD Curve Samsung TV and was just insane!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The battery started to fail.
customer_reviews.text: After warranty expiration by 9 days. The battery started to fail.. it drains the whole battery life in less than 8 minutes. The laptop restarts by itself some often when I play games. This laptop was so powerful and great for the past year. but I'm really disappointed now. What a sad story.
customer_reviews.author: Essa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: This was to good of a deal to pass up and now that I have used it very glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Owned multiple iterations of this laptop at one point. They are outstanding and deliver both on performance and value.
customer_reviews.author: wasomma

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to replace his old machine. He likes it. Says it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speed and graphics. Portable-yes, but this is more of a desktop replacement.
customer_reviews.author: keith johnson

customer_reviews.title: Looks good work great I will recommend the Asus to anyone ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good work great I will recommend the Asus to anyone and it is light for its SIZE. GREAT Buy.
customer_reviews.author: JCalo17
